banner.text: Trade our octal trading system, get technical analysis, access historical results and much more. Everything you've been looking for is on one platform, and on the device of your choice.

how_work.title: How does it work?
how_work.Subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor
how_work.text_card_one:
Visit our website or download our app.

Don't worry about installing annoying and heavy platforms, our design is user friendly and can be used from the web, as well as installed on your mobile device.
how_work.text_card_two:
Sign up or Sign in.

Create your account with peace of mind, your personal data will always be anonymous and encrypted. No verifications that put your identity at risk. We are a 100% decentralized platform.
how_work.text_card_three:
Visit our website or download our app.

Don't worry about installing annoying and heavy platforms, our design is user friendly and can be used from the web, as well as installed on your mobile device.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy policies
privacy_policy.text_one: AMTRIX respects your privacy and is committed to protecting and respecting your personal data. This privacy policy is intended to provide you with information on how we collect and process any personal data, i.e. information about a Client (as defined below) that is a natural person on the basis of which that Client can be identified. Client (hereinafter, the data) in accordance with the applicable legislation on data protection and best practices.
